articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Visits Sungri Motor Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Visits Sungri Motor Complex
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Pak Pong Ju inspected the Sungri Motor Complex.
					 The officials and workers of the complex are stepping up the production and assembly of motor parts.
					
					 Touring several places of the complex, the premier learned in detail about production.
					
					 A consultative meeting was convened on the spot to take measures for further rounding off the production processes of the complex and producing modern and diversified motors conducive to the economic development of the country.
					
					 The premier also went round the construction site for building carbon 1 chemical industry and discussed problems arising in the project.

articles.title: Talks between Head of WPK Delegation and Secretary of C.C., Mozambique Liberation Front Party
articles.content:
Talks between Head of WPK Delegation and Secretary of C.C., Mozambique Liberation Front Party
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Talks were held on July 13 between Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on a visit to Mozambique at the head of the WPK delegation and the secretary of international relations of the Central Committee of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party.
					 The head of the WPK delegation said that under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the army and people of the DPRK are dynamically advancing the building of a socialist power while foiling the vicious moves of the hostile forces for isolating and stifling the DPRK by dint of the might of single-minded unity and self-development.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the WPK to further consolidate and develop the long-standing and traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and the two countries, he said.
					
					 The secretary of international relations of the C.C., the Mozambique Liberation Front Party said that the DPRK victoriously advancing along the path of its own option under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, undeterred by the U.S. moves for isolating and stifling the DPRK gives great strength and encouragement to the people of Mozambique.
					
					 The secretary confirmed that the friendly relations between the two parties and the two countries would invariably grow stronger despite whatever tempests.
					
					 Present at the talks were a member of the WPK delegation and key members of the Central Committee of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party.

articles.title: Mongolian President Refers to Ties with DPRK
articles.content:
Mongolian President Refers to Ties with DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Hong Kyu, DPRK ambassador to Mongolia, met with Mongolian president Khaltmaa Battulga on July 11.
					 He said he got deep impression of the DPRK while visiting it several times and meeting its high-level delegations on visits to Mongolia.
					
					 He noted that he would strive for the development of relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Building of Sunchon Phosphorus Fertilizer Factory Starts
articles.content:
Building of Sunchon Phosphorus Fertilizer Factory Starts
 Sunchon, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Sunchon Phosphorus Fertilizer Factory is to be newly built.
					 The factory is of important significance in increasing the agricultural production by producing more fertilizer.
					
					 A ground-breaking ceremony of the factory took place on the spot on Sunday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier and chairman of the State Planning Commission, and others.
					
					 Jang Kil Ryong, minister of Chemical Industry, made a ground-breaking address to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called for making unprecedented miracles and innovations in building the factory by dint of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a  message from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on July 6.
					 The message says:
					
					 I pay the noblest tribute to the great President Kim Il Sung on behalf of all members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.
					
					 We are convinced that Comrade Kim Il Sung's great revolutionary exploits will shine forever along with history of humankind.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I most sincerely wish you bigger success in your noble work of leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to victory in their struggle for building a socialist power and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Uruguayan Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Uruguayan Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a letter from Ruben Maria Vera, chairman of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay, on July 8.
					 The message says:
					
					 We pay our respects to Comrade Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the party, state and army of the DPRK, and the Korean people on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of demise of Comrade Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 Now that your country is confidently advancing along the correct road of making a contribution to the struggle for national emancipation and socialism while standing against the U.S. imperialists, we congratulate the DPRK on successes being registered day after day in all spheres of the struggle for social development.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses True Colors of U.S. and S. Korean Authorities as Poser of Nuclear Threats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses True Colors of U.S. and S. Korean Authorities as Poser of Nuclear Threats
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article that the U.S. and south Korean authorities are seeking to shift the responsibility for escalated situation on to the DPRK while talking about the "nuclear weapons and missile threats from the north," but their purpose can never be concealed.
					 The article notes that the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail on the DPRK have long history.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 On July 15, 1957 the U.S. officially declared that it started the project of arming the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea with nuclear weapons and introduced huge nuclear weapons into south Korea. Since then, the U.S. has run amuck to realize its ambition for invading the DPRK with south Korea as an advanced post.
					
					 In essence, the Trump's administration's DPRK policy billed "maximum pressure and engagement" is a brigandish and aggressive one for stamping out the DPRK's sovereignty through military threat and high-level military pressure and realizing its attempt at invading the latter.
					
					 According to the policy, the U.S. has frantically staged the largest-scale joint military drills against the DPRK by introducing huge nuclear strategic assets including nuclear carrier task forces and special warfare forces and has tightened the siege against the latter with the use of south Korea, Japan and other vassal forces while deploying the reinforced nuclear carrier task forces in the waters around the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities engrossed in submission to the U.S. and dependence on outsiders are openly joining in the U.S. moves for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK while talking about the "settlement of the north's nuclear issue".
					
					 Owning to the U.S. and south Korean authorities' frantic moves for kicking off a nuclear war against the DPRK, dark clouds of a nuclear war are heavily hanging over the Korean peninsula and the inter-Korean relations are still in the mire of catastrophe.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns S. Korean Warmongers against Military Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns S. Korean Warmongers against Military Drills against DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet marine corps staged a drill in the area of Phohang for improving the capability for combined operation with the marines of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					 A combined guided missile firing drill of the naval and air forces was frantically staged in the East Sea of Korea under the pretext of "coping with the marine provocation from the north".
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet warmongers conducted a joint striking drill for precisely bombing the core establishments of the DPRK by introducing a B-1B formation of the U.S. forces from Guam.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says the above-said facts go to prove that the puppet forces are running amuck to put into practice their adventurous scenario of making a preemptive strike at the DPRK in collusion with their U.S. master under the pretext of "provocation" and "threat" from someone.
					
					 The commentary stresses that it is tragic that the puppet forces are not aware of the fact that their war-thirsty acts are as foolish as precipitating their own ruin.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The puppet forces should clearly face up to the reality in which their U.S. master are seized with uneasiness and horror as its mainland and Pacific operational area are put in the striking range of the DPRK.
					
					 Those who provoke the DPRK can never evade merciless annihilating blow whether they are near us or across the ocean.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet warmongers would be well advised to think twice about the DPRK's warnings and stop their reckless war racket if they do not want miserable ends.

articles.title: Japan's Sincere Apology for Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Sincere Apology for Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News, civic organizations in Taejon, south Korea held a Wednesday meeting on July 12 in demand of the proper settlement of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 Speakers said that they would fight it out to settle the issue of the sexual slavery.
					
					 They stressed that the sexual slavery is the grave crime which should no longer happen and Japan should make a sincere apology to the victims.

articles.title: Unabated Struggle against THAAD Waged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unabated Struggle against THAAD Waged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News, the Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism held a forum on the struggle against THAAD in Iksan, North Jolla Province on July 13.
					 Speakers accused the former "government" of inflicting big wound on Won Buddhists through illegal and unilateral deployment of THAAD.
					
					 They called for conducting a campaign for defending holy land and withdrawing THAAD by developing the emergency measure committee into a permanent one.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Mexico
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Mexican website Friends of Korea posted respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on July 3 to observe the 23rd demise anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for resolutely defending the idea and exploits of the great leaders and adding luster to them forever.
					
					 Posted on the website was a photo of the President.

articles.title: Diplomas to Great Men of Mt Paektu from Peru
articles.content:
Diplomas to Great Men of Mt Paektu from Peru
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian newspaper Callao presented diplomas to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on July 11 ahead of the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The diplomas were conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Peru by the director general and editor-in-chief of the Callao.
					
					 Written in the diplomas are letters reading that they are presented to the great leaders who brightly showed the road ahead of humankind by founding the Juche idea and reliably defended the country's sovereignty and dignity from all sorts of challenges of the imperialists and to the Supreme Leader who is advancing the socialist cause to victory, true to the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Career and Feats Lauded in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Career and Feats Lauded in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups on July 5-8 to commemorate the 23rd demise anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The papers carried the portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and photos of the great persons of Mt Paektu.
					
					 Paper Zavtra, in an article titled "The great leader in the 20th century", said that Kim Il Sung will be always alive in the mind of humankind as the great leader representing the 20th century, though he passed away.
					
					 Trudovaya Rossia, in an article "Bright sunny image of Comrade Kim Il Sung", said that he treated all people warmly and took care of them with paternal affection, always with sunny smile on his face.
					
					 Byvor said in an article "Sunny smile" that the smiling image of the President can be seen anywhere in the DPRK.
					
					 His sunny smile will shine forever along with the DPRK undergoing rapid change and making leap forward on a daily basis under the care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the article added.
					
					 Zebri Deve, an online paper of Khabarovsk Territory, carried an article praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President who was the most prominent leader, peerlessly great man and great sage of humankind in the 20th century.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties and organizations and personages in different countries visited DPRK missions between July 3 and 8 to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They placed floral baskets and bouquets at the pictures of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Among them were delegations of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico and the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the deputy director of the Political Bureau of the Cuban Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces and his party, the general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and other party and organization leaders of Nepal, Cambodia, Iran, Bangladesh, Nigeria, DR Congo, Angola and Brazil and the chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 The Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar sent a floral basket to the DPRK mission on July 7.

articles.title: Nigerian Bodies Congratulate DPRK on Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-14
articles.content:
Nigerian Bodies Congratulate DPRK on Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-14
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- We congratulate the DPRK on successful test-firing of the intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 and hope that the army and the people of the DPRK will bolster up the military capability in every way and gain a greater victory in the struggle for the building of a powerful socialist country and the reunification of the country.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies said this in a joint statement on July 6.
					
					 The statement noted that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made sure that the DPRK has rapidly ranked itself among a few nuclear weapons states, satellite manufacturers and launchers and strategic submarine ballistic missile states in the world and then successfully test-fired Hwasong-14.
					
					 The scientists and technicians in the defense field of the DPRK succeeded in the test-fire of the intercontinental ballistic rocket capable of striking the mainland of the U.S. at one go, thus fully demonstrating the independent dignity of Juche Korea and the indomitable spirit of the heroic Korean people.
					
					 The great success of the recent test-fire is another brilliant victory won by the Korean people in the showdown with the imperialists and the U.S. that has lasted century after century.
